item.description:
On Thursday, July 26, at 7:15p, The Disproof Atheism Society will present “A Critique of Plantinga’s Where the Conflict Really Lies,” a talk by Tyler Wunder (Wilfrid Laurier University, Ontario) critically examining Plantinga’s new book of arguments for God and against naturalism.

Location: Tufts University, Rm. 208 in Anderson Hall, 200 College Ave., Medford. Free & open to all. Info: DASociety@aol.com.
item.name: Disproof Atheism: A Critique of Plantinga's "Where the Conflict Really Lies"
